targets.query:
from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "isardvdi-api")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "desktops")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -100000000000000s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "isardvdi-authentication")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "login")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "isardvdi-api")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "templates")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "viewers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["viewer_type"] == "viewer_port_spice")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "viewers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["viewer_type"] == "viewer_port_spice_tls")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU %

targets.query:
from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["_measurement"] == "domain"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "id"])
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> count(column: "id")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "isardvdi-authentication")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "login")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "visors_started")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "mem_total"
  )
   |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "vcpu_current"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

targets.legendFormat: Escritorios Creados
targets.query:
Desktops = from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" 
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "id"])
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, column: "id", fn:(column, tables=<-) => tables 
    |> unique(column: column)
    |> count(column:column),)
  |> rename(columns: {id: "_value"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Desktops:r._value, _time:r._time }))
  |> yield()
Visors = from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "visors_started")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Visors:r._value, _time:r._time  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

targets.legendFormat: Plantillas Creadas
Escritorios
targets.query:
Desktops = from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" 
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "id"])
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, column: "id", fn:(column, tables=<-) => tables 
    |> unique(column: column)
    |> count(column:column),)
  |> rename(columns: {id: "_value"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Desktops:r._value, _time:r._time }))
  |> yield()
Visors = from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "visors_started")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Visors:r._value, _time:r._time  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

targets.legendFormat: Usuaris Totals
targets.query: SELECT mean("cpu_percent") FROM "$host.docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

targets.legendFormat: {{role}}
System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode
Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode
Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete
Irq - Servicing interrupts
Softirq - Servicing softirqs
Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment
Guest - Time spent running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system

targets.expr: node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{} - node_memory_Buffers_bytes{} - node_memory_Cached_bytes{} - node_memory_Slab_bytes{} - node_memory_PageTables_bytes{} - node_memory_SwapCached_bytes{}
targets.legendFormat: Apps - Memory used by user-space applications
PageTables - Memory used to map between virtual and physical memory addresses
SwapCache - Memory that keeps track of pages that have been fetched from swap but not yet been modified
Slab - Memory used by the kernel to cache data structures for its own use (caches like inode, dentry, etc)
Cache - Parked file data (file content) cache
Buffers - Block device (e.g. harddisk) cache
Unused - Free memory unassigned
Swap - Swap space used
Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working
{{mountpoint}}
vCPU
targets.query:
from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "vcpu_current"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

   |> group(columns: ["id"])
